癌症干细胞外泌体如何促进肿瘤生长并逃避免疫攻击2023 年 12 月 20 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“治疗性利用癌症干细胞衍生的外泌体”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/How-cancer-stem-cell-exosomes-fuel-tumor-growth-and-evade-immune-attack.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/How-cancer-stem-cell-exosomes-fuel-tumor-growth-and-evade-immune-attack.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0b6bc86-ac23-4c9a-bc89-39dd10334262 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 23:59:00 -0500 How cancer stem cell exosomes fuel tumor growth and evade immune attack
力量训练计划改善了 20,000 多名老年人的生活近 20 年来，史蒂芬·鲍尔 (Stephen Ball) 一直肩负着一项使命：帮助密苏里州老年人保持健康，通过体育锻炼变得更强壮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Strength-training-program-boosts-lives-of-over-20000-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Strength-training-program-boosts-lives-of-over-20000-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2abe9b1-796f-4d82-95fe-c4d7cb9232bf Wed, 03 Jan 2024 23:56:18 -0500 Strength training program boosts lives of over 20,000 seniors
利用巨噬细胞治疗创伤性脑损伤的新方法科学家们创造了一种治疗创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 的新疗法，可使猪的脑损伤缩小 56%，并显着降低局部炎症水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/New-approach-leverages-macrophages-to-treat-traumatic-brain-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/New-approach-leverages-macrophages-to-treat-traumatic-brain-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f898879d-6409-4c05-91de-3bf45507e295 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 23:51:03 -0500 New approach leverages macrophages to treat traumatic brain injury
缺失的蛋白质解释了儿童头皮皮肤缺失的百年之谜患有先天性皮肤发育不全 (ACC) 的儿童出生时头皮中线缺乏皮肤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Missing- Proteins-explain- century-old-mystery-of-scalp-skin-absence-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Missing- Proteins-explain- century-old-mystery-of-scalp-skin-absence-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d85b4d8b-da25-4b20-9a99-ab2a31d949af Wed, 03 Jan 2024 23:43:05 -0500 Missing proteins explain century-old mystery of scalp skin absence in children
佩戴助听器可以延长人的寿命研究显示，大约 4000 万美国成年人患有听力损失，但只有十分之一需要助听器的人使用助听器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Wearing-hearing-aids-could-extend-peoples-lifespan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Wearing-hearing-aids-could-extend-peoples-lifespan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4912c8a9-0669-47a2-a5b6-1f5316e2b875 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 23:34:01 -0500 Wearing hearing aids could extend people's lifespan
妊娠体重和血液标记物可以预测妊娠期糖尿病的不良结局研究人员表示，妊娠期糖尿病 (GDM) 女性血液中测量的妊娠体重和生化标记物与不良妊娠结局风险增加有关，这为精准诊断提供了新的方向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Pregnancy-weight-and-blood-markers-may-predict-poor-outcomes-for-gestational-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Pregnancy-weight-and-blood-markers-may-predict-poor-outcomes-for-gestational-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=298aa557-b1c4-408a-a4dc-6acb24f2e65f Wed, 03 Jan 2024 23:26:16 -0500 Pregnancy weight and blood markers may predict poor outcomes for gestational diabetes
氡暴露与女性中风患者血细胞突变风险增加有关氡是铀或镭等金属在岩石和土壤中分解时产生的一种天然放射性气体，是导致肺癌的已知原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Radon-exposure-linked-to-increased-risk-of-blood-cell-mutation-in-female-中风-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Radon-exposure-linked-to-increased-risk-of-blood-cell-mutation-in-female-中风-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e22af20f-fb24-48ef-a6d4-f0eb6bb8082a Wed, 03 Jan 2024 23:18:40 -0500 Radon exposure linked to increased risk of blood cell mutation in female stroke patients
中年时期的睡眠碎片与十年后认知功能较差有关根据美国科学院医学杂志《神经病学》2024 年 1 月 3 日在线期刊上发表的一项新研究，30 多岁和 40 多岁时睡眠受到更多干扰的人可能在十年后更有可能出现记忆和思维问题。神经病学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Fragmented-sleep-in-midlife-linked-to-poorer-cognitive-function-a-decade-later.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Fragmented-sleep-in-midlife-linked-to-poorer-cognitive-function-a-decade-later.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f53adea9-a1be-42d9-a843-fe549f3424bb Wed, 03 Jan 2024 23:07:37 -0500 Fragmented sleep in midlife linked to poorer cognitive function a decade later
蔬菜、豆类和海鲜饮食可降低老年男性心脏病风险研究表明，与富含全谷物、牛奶、水果或加工肉类的饮食相比，富含蔬菜、豆类和海鲜的饮食可显着降低 75 岁以上男性发生主要不良心血管事件的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Vegetables-legumes-and-seafood-diet-linked-to-lower-heart-risk-in-older-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Vegetables-legumes-and-seafood-diet-linked-to-lower-heart-risk-in-older-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13a58686-3a5a-4d02-be4d-ce1975cb4112 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 23:06:00 -0500 Vegetables, legumes, and seafood diet linked to lower heart risk in older men
研究人员发现 IBD 对不同种族、性别和出生地的人的影响存在差异罗格斯大学和其他机构的研究人员发现，炎症性肠病 (IBD) 对不同种族、性别和出生地的人的影响存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Researchers-uncover-variations-in-how-IBD-affects-people-of- Different-races-sexes-and-places-of-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Researchers-uncover-variations-in-how-IBD-affects-people-of- Different-races-sexes-and-places-of-birth.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b46182f-2782-4bd3-b8e0-6f954e6c1453 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 22:51:16 -0500 Researchers uncover variations in how IBD affects people of different races, sexes and places of birth
